label: 朝堂院
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Also called the Hasshō-in (Eight Ministries Palace). Where the Sovereign (Tennō) held court, the coronation (sokui) took place, the eight ministries (shō) met, etc., being one of the palaces in the Imperial Palace. [八省院、天皇、即位、省]
